_header: Out of the blossom sprang a thorn
_description: An Epiphany carol — twelve quatrains (aaab) with refrain element, ‘…his moder Marie’, burden lacking

BLSl2593.First Lines:
Out of þe blosme sprang a þornQuan god hymself wold be
                    born…
BLSl2593.Last Lines:
…& let vs neuer be forlornÞat born was of
                    marie
